text: If ${player} has ever stolen a street sign while drunk, he drinks 3 sips and tells the story.
${player}, if you've ever broken something important while drunk, drink 2 sips and ${player} guesses what it was.
Everyone who has ever thrown up during a drinking session drinks 2 sips. ${player} tells his worst experience.
${player}, if you've ever had trouble with the police while drunk, drink 4 sips and tell the story (without compromising details).
If ${player} has ever been refused entry to a taxi because of his condition, he drinks 3 sips and acts out the scene.
${player}, if you've ever smoked more than a pack of cigarettes in one drinking night, drink 2 sips and give 2 sips to ${player}.
Everyone who has ever woken up far from home without knowing how drinks 3 sips. ${player} tells his most wtf wake-up.
${player}, if you've ever been banned from entering a bar, drink 2 sips and explain why to ${player}.
If ${player} has ever called in sick to work when he was just hungover, he drinks 2 sips.
${player}, if you've ever done a beer funnel, drink 2 sips and show your technique to ${player}.
If ${player} has ever lost his driver's license because of alcohol, he drinks 5 sips and everyone toasts to his 'memory'.
${player}, if you've ever been kicked out of a club for inappropriate behavior, drink 3 sips and tell the story (censored version).
Everyone who has ever taken an electric scooter while drunk drinks 2 sips. ${player} mimes the driving.
${player}, if you've ever received a beer shower, drink 2 sips and ${player} pours you a symbolic one.
If ${player} has ever drunk alcohol on a Sunday morning, he drinks 2 sips and gives 1 sip to each player.
${player}, if you've ever insulted someone while drunk, drink 2 sips and apologize to ${player}.
Everyone who has ever taken hangover medication drinks 1 sip. ${player} reveals his secret remedy.
${player}, if you've ever hit someone while drunk, drink 4 sips and explain the circumstances to ${player}.

${player}, if you've ever driven after drinking (even a little), drink 5 sips and promise to never do it again.

${player}, if you've ever dropped someone while carrying them when you were drunk, drink 2 sips and apologize to ${player}.
